content: i needed a last-minute scarf for my sister-in-law whose fruh-fruh meter ticks in at the low end but the thought of knitting one long stockinette rectangle was enough to send me running for the hills so i dug through my knitting library and came up with this the scarf with no name it s simple enough to knit up quickly this one took about two nights but interesting enough to keep you out of stockinette hell and the result a very striking scarf that works great for women men kids pets you name it looks pretty cool on the flip side too with ~122 grams of worsted weight this one came to around 70 long actual yardage will vary depending on desired length please click here 1 for errata *** i regretfully cannot provide pattern support at this time thank you for your understanding *** 1 http //knittywhipped blogspot com/2008/01/free-patterns-one-and-all html
